name: RPSDX 7DRL 2022
description:
Use arrow keys to move character. 

The idea for this game started over 4 years ago and shelved until now. The breakthrough for this gamejam was the mask interface which was critical to making this idea playable.

Game design, programming and art by Jonathon Yule
Music by Samson Graham

Submission for the 2022 7DRL game jam.
